thread.title: Swansea City fear losing Ghana star Andre Ayew in January after Liverpool interest
thread.title_full: Swansea City fear losing Ghana star Andre Ayew in January after Liverpool interest

title: Swansea City fear losing Ghana star Andre Ayew in January after Liverpool interest
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Swansea City fear losing Ghana star Andre Ayew in January after Liverpool interest 
Swansea fear that Liverpool will try and seal a surprise deal for playmaker Andre Ayew in January, as reported by the Mirror . 
Ayew, 25, only joined Swansea in the summer signing from Ligue 1 outfit Marseille. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
